A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: This movie is an adventurous departure from what you think a Star Wars can be. However\, it includes many Disney tropes that play it very safe\, and inserts comedy is unnecessary. This movie goes it's own way\, but departs from what was set up in The Force Awakens. The character relations between Luke\, Kylo and Rey are handled beautifully and make for some of the best moments in Star Wars.
